title: Booster Watch Face
summary: Boost your style with Booster Watch face
description: Booster Watch face with cool unusual seconds and battery indicators..Features:✔ Digital time✔ Analog time✔ Date✔ Weather (Providers: Open Weather Map, YR, Yahoo)✔ Watch battery indicator✔ Phone battery indicatorSettings:✔ Animation on/off✔ Custom color configuration✔ Custom hour format (am/pm)✔ Sweep or tick seconds✔ Screen time settings✔ Transparent peek cars✔ Big or small peek card✔ OK Google positionLive chat and email support on: http://www.richface.watch
descriptionHTML:
Booster Watch face with cool unusual seconds and battery indicators..

Features:
✔ Digital time
✔ Analog time
✔ Date
✔ Weather (Providers: Open Weather Map, YR, Yahoo)
✔ Watch battery indicator
✔ Phone battery indicator

Settings:
✔ Animation on/off
✔ Custom color configuration
✔ Custom hour format (am/pm)
✔ Sweep or tick seconds
✔ Screen time settings
✔ Transparent peek cars
✔ Big or small peek card
✔ OK Google position

Live chat and email support on: http://www.richface.watch
comments: HTML color codes The only thing missing from this watcface is the ability to use HTML color codes in customizing the colors. Most of the richface watches have this option but this watcface is stuck with just the clumsy color picker.
Nice Watchface for Moto 360 Nice Watchface for my Moto360-2G. The weather doesn't work well though.. needs fixing.. It's way off.
Good but needs improvements Looks good but you should add option to disable analog clock or digital as it's difficult to see the time on digital clock
